title: Radar Box Application (PSOC™ 6)
description: Detect human presence within a configurable range using radar sensors and PSOC™ 6 processing.
long_description: This application demonstrates the use of Infineon's XENSIV™ 60 GHz radar sensor (BGT60TR13C) and PSOC™ 6 MCU to detect human presence within a specified range.

links.label: GitHub
links.heading: Try Today
links.sub-heading: Test out the Entrance Counter for BGT60TR13C™ Radar
